text:
Yandex has launched a courier robot. He is delivering mail, but this is only the beginning
07 Nov 2019, 15:42 by Artyom Bausov
Yandex showed its first self-guided robot courier.
Now the device is being tested at the company's headquarters. It is used to transport small loads, travels completely independently: identifies objects, gives way to pedestrians and even animals. And thanks to the lidar, the gadget can navigate in the dark.
The first few robots are already trying their hand at business. They carry documents from the doors of Yandex headquarters to the bus that delivers them to other company offices in Moscow. The robot moves completely independently, but at the test stage, the operator remotely looks after it. - Yandex
The gadget moves on six wheels, and its height reaches 50 cm. During movement, a white LED strip is activated. Upon arrival, it lights up green.
The company plans to use the robot in the future to deliver Yandex.Food and orders from the Beru site. Goods are placed in the top cover, which can only be opened through the application.



After testing is complete, Yandex wants to offer its development to other companies. For example, logistic.
